SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.2_0: prajñāmalā sānucarābhidharmaḥ tatprāptaye yāpi ca yacca śāstram /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.3_0: dharmāṇāṃ pravicayamantareṇa nāsti kleśānāṃ yata upaśāntaye 'bhyupāyaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.3_1: kleśaiśca bhramati bhavārṇave 'tra lokastaddhetorata uditaḥ kilaiṣa śāstrā //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.8_1: duḥkhaṃ samudayo loko dṛṣṭisthānaṃ bhavaśca te //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.16_0: vijñānaṃ prativijñaptiḥ mana āyatanaṃ ca tat /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.16_1: dhātavaḥ sapta ca matāḥ ṣaḍ vijñānānyatho mahaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.33_1: tau prajñāmānasī vyagrā smṛtiḥ sarvaiva mānasī //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.34_1: navānupāttā te cāṣṭau śabdaśca anye nava dvidhā //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.35_0: spraṣṭavyaṃ dvividhaṃ śeṣā rūpiṇo nava bhautikāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.36_0: chinatti chidyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātu catuṣṭayam /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.37_1: na śabdaḥ apratighā aṣṭau naiḥṣyandika vipākajāḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.38_1: cakṣurvijñānadhātvoḥ syāt pṛthak lābhaḥ sahāpi ca //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.39_1: sabhāgaḥ tatsabhāgāśca śeṣāḥ yo na svakarmakṛt //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.40_0: daśa bhāvanayā heyāḥ pañca ca antyāstrayastridhā /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.42_0: cakṣuḥ paśyati rūpāṇi sabhāgaṃ na tadāśritam /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.42_1: vijñānaṃ dṛśyate rūpaṃ na kilāntaritaṃ yataḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.46_0: na kāyasyādharaṃ cakṣuḥ ūrdhvaṃ rūpaṃ na cakṣuṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.46_1: vijñānaṃ ca asya rūpaṃ tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.47_0: tathā śrotraṃ trayāṇāṃ tu sarvameva svabhūmikam /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_1.48_0: pañca bāhyā divijñeyāḥ nityā dharmā asaṃskṛtāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:3_0: abhidharmakośabhāṣye dhātunirdeśo nāma prathamaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti /
SA01vakobhku:4_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
SA01vakobhku:4_1: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.7_1: śātā dhyāne tṛtīye tu caitasī sā sukhendriyam //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.8_0: anyatra sā saumanasyaṃ aśātā caitasī punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.9_1: rūpīṇi jīvitaṃ duḥkhe sāsravāṇi dvidhā nava //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.12_1: duḥkhe ca hitvā ārūpyāptaṃ sukhe cāpohya rūpi ca //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.13_1: nava bhavanayā pañca tvaheyānyapi na trayam //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.14_1: teḥ ṣaḍ vā sapta vā aṣṭau vā ṣaḍ rūpeṣu ekamuttare //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.15_1: upekṣāṃ caiva rūpe 'ṣṭau kāme daśa navāṣṭau vā //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.16_0: kramamṛtyau tu catvāri śubhe sarvatra pañca ca /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.18_1: saumanasyī ca duḥkhī tu saptabhiḥ strīndriyādimān //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.24_0: vedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśo matiḥ smṛtiḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.25_1: mūladvayamahiṃsā ca vīryaṃ ca kuśale sadā //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.32_1: prema śraddhā gurutvaṃ hrīḥ te punaḥ kāmarūpayoḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.33_1: madaḥ svadharme raktasya paryādānaṃ tu cetasaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.39_0: nivṛtasya ca rūpasya kāme rūpasya nāgrajā /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.43_1: śubhā dvivedyāniyatā ca āryasya āpyā prayogataḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.48_0: sabhāgatā sā tu punarvipāko 'pi āptayo dvidhā /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.51_0: caittā dvau saṃvarau teṣāṃ cetaso lakṣaṇāni ca /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.59_0: varttamānāḥ phalaṃ pañca gṛṇhanti dvau prayacchataḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.60_1: vipākaṃ sarvagaṃ hitvā tau sabhāgaṃ ca śeṣajāḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.61_1: catvāraḥ pratyayā uktāḥ hetvākhyaḥ pañca hetavaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.63_0: nirudhyamāne kāritraṃ dvau hetū kurutaḥ trayaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.65_0: dvidhā bhūtāni taddhetuḥ bhautikasya tu pañcadhā /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.67_0: kāme nava śubhāccittāccittāni aṣṭābhya eva tat /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.69_0: aṣṭābhyo nivṛtaṃ tasmāt ṣaṭ tribhyo 'nivṛtaṃ punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.69_1: tasmāt ṣaṭ evāmārūpye tasya nītiḥ śubhātpunaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.70_0: nava cittāni tat ṣaṇṇāṃ nivṛtātsapta tattathā /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.70_1: caturbhyaḥ śaikṣam asmāttu pañca aśaikṣaṃ tu pañcakāt //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.73_0: kliṣṭe traidhātuke lābhaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dvayoḥ śubhe /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_2.73_1: trayāṇāṃ rūpaje śaikṣe caturṇāṃ tasya śeṣite //
SA01vakobhku:7_0: abhidharmakośe indriyanirddeśo nāma dvitīyaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.8_0: vijñānaṃ na sthitiḥ proktaṃ catuṣkoṭi tu saṃgrahe /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.24_0: sa bhaviṣyat bhavaphalaṃ kurute karma tat bhavaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.26_0: kleśāstrīṇi dvayaṃ karma sapta vastu phalaṃ tathā /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.27_0: kleśāt kleśaḥ kriyā caiva tato vastu tataḥ punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.30_0: nāma tvarūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ sparśāḥ ṣaṭ saṃnipātajāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.32_0: tajjāḥ ṣaḍvedanāḥ pañca kāyikī caitasī parā /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.34_0: svo 'ṣṭālambanam ārūpyo dvayoḥ dhyānadvaye tu ṣaṭ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.34_1: kāmāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ caturṇā svaḥ ekasyālambanaṃ paraḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.36_0: uktaṃ ca vakṣyate cānyat atra tu kleśā iṣyate /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.49_1: dvīpāḥ bahiścakravāḍaḥ sapta haimāḥ sa āyasaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.52_0: ābhyantaraḥ samudro 'sau triguṇaḥ sa tu pārśvataḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.53_0: lakṣatrayaṃ sahasrāṇi viṃśatirdve ca tatra tu /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.55_1: sārdhe dve madhyamasya aṣṭau caturasraḥ kuruḥ samaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.63_1: ṣoḍaśāṣṭau sahasrāṇi catvāri dve ca nirgatāḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.66_1: puraṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma haimaṃ citratalaṃ mṛdu //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.69_0: tata ūrdhva vimāneṣu devāḥ kāmabhujastu ṣaṭ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.76_1: kāmināṃ rūpiṇāṃ tvādau yojanārdhaṃ tataḥ param //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.87_1: dhanuḥ pañcaśatānyeṣāṃ krośo raṇyaṃ ca tanmatam //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.88_1: tatkṣaṇaḥ te punaḥ ṣaṣṭirlavaḥ triṃśad guṇottarāḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.96_0: ekadvitricaturdvīpāḥ na ca dvau saha buddhavat /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.99_1: divasān sapta māsāṃśca varṣāṇi ca yathākramam //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_3.102_0: saptāgninā adbhirekā evaṃ gate 'dbhiḥ saptake punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:10_0: abhidharmakośabhāṣye lokanirdeśo nāma tṛtīyaṃ kośasthānam samāptamiti /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.1_0: karmajaṃ lokavaicitryaṃ cetanā tatkṛtaṃ ca tat /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.3_0: na kasyacidahetoḥ syāt hetuḥ syācca vināśakaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.3_1: dvigrāhyaṃ syāt na cāṇau tat vāgvijñaptistu vāgdhvaniḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.12_1: tulyaṃ muneḥ śubhaṃ yāvat nobhayaṃ tu vipākajam //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.23_0: vijñaptyā tu punaḥ sarve kurvanto madhyayānvitāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.29_1: catvāryekaṃ tathā trīṇi smṛtināśo madaśca taiḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.31_1: tatpalanāt kila proktāḥ mṛdvāditvaṃ yathā manaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.32_1: nirvāṇaṃ ceti śaraṇaṃ yo yāti śaraṇatrayam //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.43_1: kurūṃśca saṃvaro 'pyevaṃ devānāṃ ca nṛṇāṃ trayaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.53_1: dṛṣṭadharmaphalaṃ tacca nikāyo hyeka eva saḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.54_1: guṇakṣetre ca niyataṃ tatpitrorghātakaṃ ca yat //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.61_1: yā cetanā dvādaśadhā karma kṛṣṇakṣayāya tat //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.62_0: navame cetanā yā sā kṛṣṇaśuklakṣayāya ca /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.72_0: samaṃ prāk ca mṛtasyāsti na maulaḥ anyāśrayodayāt /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.78_1: mithyādṛṣṭiḥ trayo hyatra panthānaḥ sapta karma ca //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.88_0: anāsravaṃ punaḥ śeṣaṃ tribhiravyākṛtaṃ ca yat /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.88_1: catvāri dve tathā trīṇi kuśalasya śubhādayaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.89_1: avyākṛtasya dve trīṇi trīṇī caite śubhādayaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.91_1: śaikṣasya trīṇi śaikṣādyāḥ aśaikṣasya tu karmaṇaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.92_0: dharmāḥ śaikṣādikā ekaṃ phalaṃ trīṇyapi ca dvayam /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.92_1: tābhyāmanyasya śaikṣādyā dve dve pañca phalāni ca //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.93_0: trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛggheyasya tadādayaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.94_0: apraheyasya te tvekaṃ dve catvāri yathākramam /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.95_1: nākṣepike samāpattī acitte prāptayo na ca //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.97_0: triṣu dvipeṣvānantarya śaṇḍhā dīnāṃ tu neṣyate /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.100_0: bhikṣurdṛk carito vṛttī bhinatti anyatra bāliśān /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.101_0: cakrabhedaḥ sa ca mataḥ jambūdvīpe navādibhiḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.108_0: bodhisattvaḥ kuto yāvat yato lakṣaṇa karmakṛt /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.109_1: cintāmayaṃ kalpaśate śeṣa ākṣipate hi tat //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.112_1: puṇyaṃ kriyātha tadvastu trayaṃ karmapathā yathā //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.115_0: dātā viśiṣṭaḥ śraddhādyaiḥ satkṛtyādi dadāti ataḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.117_1: agraṃ muktasya muktāya bodhisattvasya ca aṣṭamam //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_4.127_0: sāvadyā nivṛtā hīnāḥ kliṣṭāḥ dharmāḥ śubhāmalāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_5.1_1: māno 'vidyā ca dṛṣṭiśca vicikitsā ca te punaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_5.12_1: vimatiḥ saha tābhiśca yāvidyāveṇikī ca yā //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_5.18_1: yena yaḥ saṃprayuktastu sa tasmin saṃprayogataḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_5.24_1: ajaiḥ sarvatra śeṣaistu sarvaiḥ sarvatra saṃyutaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_5.27_0: kiṃ vighnaṃ tatkathaṃ nānyat adhvāyogaḥ tathā sataḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_5.38_1: upādānāni avidyā tu grāhikā ne ti miśritā //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_5.49_1: anye ca ṣaṭkleśamalāḥ māyā śāṭhyaṃ madastathā //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_5.55_0: sukhābhyāṃ saṃprayukto hi rāgaḥ dveṣo viparyayāt /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_5.58_0: māyā śāṭhyamatho mrakṣo middhaṃ cobhayathā madaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_5.64_1: ekā dvayoḥ kṣaye dve te tathordhvaṃ tisra eva tāḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_5.65_1: tisraḥ parijñāḥ ṣaṭ kṣāntiphalaṃ jñānasya śeṣitāḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_5.67_0: āryamārgasya sarvāḥ dve laukikasya anvayasya ca /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_5.67_1: dharmajñānasya tisrastu ṣaṭ tatpakṣasya pañca ca //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_5.69_1: bhāvanāsthaḥ punaḥ ṣaḍibharekayā vā dvayena vā //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_5.70_1: ekāṃ dve pañca ṣaṭ kaścijjahātyāpnoti pañca na //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.4_0: yatra bhinnena tadbuddhiranyāpohe dhiyā ca tat /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.12_1: kāmāśrayā na bāhyānām ṣaḍ vidhā gaṇanādibhiḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.13_1: naiḥṣyandikau nādhareṇa lakṣyete manasā ca tau //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.18_1: tebhyaḥ kṣāntiḥ dvidhā tadvat kṣāntyā dharmeṇa vardhanam //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.22_0: ādye dve parihāṇyā ca maulestatraiva satyadṛk /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.23_1: śiṣyagotrā nnivartya dve buddhaḥ syāt trīṇyapītaraḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.31_0: ṣoḍaśe tu phalasthau tau yatra yaḥ pratipannakaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.33_0: navaprakārā doṣā hi bhūmau bhūmau tathā guṇāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.55_0: kāme trayāptiḥ antyasya triṣu nordhva hi dṛkpathaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.59_1: antyā śāsturakopyasya madhyā cānyasya tu tridhā //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.60_0: mriyate na phalabhraṣṭaḥ tadakārya karoti na /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.61_1: aśaikṣo nava niśritya bhūmīḥ śaikṣastu ṣaṭ yataḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.62_1: dvau buddhau śrāvakāḥ sapta navaite navadhendriyāḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.63_1: pudgalāḥ sapta ṣaṭ tvete dvau dvau mārgatraye yataḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.68_0: śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā samādhiḥ prītyupekṣaṇe /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.70_1: bhāvane darśane caiva sapta vargā yathākramam //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.75_0: mārgaśca dravyatastu dve śraddhā śīlaṃ ca nirmalāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.75_1: noktā vimuktiḥ śaikṣāṅgaṃ baddhatvāt sā punardvidhā //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_6.76_1: sāṅgaḥ saiva vimuktī dve jñānaṃ bodhiryathoditā //
SA01vakobhku:22_0: abhidharmakośe mārgapudgalanirdeśo nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_7.1_1: tadanyobhayathāryā dhīḥ anyā jñānaṃ dṛśaśca ṣaṭ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_7.4_0: te eva satyabhedena catvāri ete caturvidhe /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_7.10_1: tathā ca sāṃvṛtaṃ svaiḥ svaiḥ satyākāraiścatuṣṭayam //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_7.14_1: dharmākhyaṃ ṣaṭsu navasu tvanvayākhyaṃ tathaiva ṣaṭ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_7.17_1: caturṇāṃ daśa naikasya yojyā dharmāḥ punardaśa //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_7.22_0: ṣoḍaśe ṣaṭ sarāgasya vītarāgasya sapta tu /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_7.25_0: navānāṃ tu kṣayajñāne akopyasya daśa bhāvanā /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_7.28_1: sthānāsthāne daśa jñānāni aṣṭau karmaphale nava //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_7.29_1: daśa vā saṃvṛtijñānaṃ dvayoḥ ṣaṭ daśa vā kṣaye //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_7.37_0: tathaiva praṇidhijñānaṃ sarvālambaṃ tu tat tathā /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_7.39_1: daśa ṣaḍvārthasaṃvit sā sarvatra anye tu sāṃvṛtam //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_7.46_1: iṣṭe śaikṣasya nokte tu vidye sāvidyasaṃtateḥ //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_7.47_0: ādyā tṛtīyā ṣaṣṭhī ca prātihāryāṇi śāsanam /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_7.48_0: ṛddhiḥ samādhiḥ gamanaṃ nirmāṇaṃ ca gatistridhā /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_7.50_0: yathākramaṃ dhyānaphalaṃ dve yāvat pañca nordhvajam /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_7.56_0: cetojñānaṃ tu tattredhā tarkavidyākṛtaṃ ca yat /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_8.8_0: tṛtīye pañca tūpekṣā smṛtiḥ prajñā sukhaṃ sthitiḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_8.9_0: dravyato daśa caikaṃ ca prasrabdhi sukhamādyayoḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_8.11_1: vitarkacārau śvāsau ca sukhādi ca catuṣṭayam //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_8.15_1: utpadyate tathā śuddhāt kliṭaṃ cāpi svabhūmikam //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_8.16_0: kliṣṭāt svaṃ śuddakaṃ kliṣṭaṃ evaṃ cādharaśuddhakam /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_8.16_1: cyutau tu śuddhakāt kliṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ kliṣṭāttu nottaram //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_8.18_0: dve trīṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca hāna bhāgādyanantaram /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_8.22_1: ārya cādyaṃ tridhā kecit atarka dhyānamantaram //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_8.31_0: dhyānayormuditā anyāni ṣaṭ su kecittu pañcasu /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_8.31_1: na taiḥ prahāṇaṃ nṛṣveva janyante tryanvito dhruvam //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_8.36_0: daśa kṛtsnāni alobhāṣṭau dhyāne 'ntye gocaraḥ punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_8.38_1: dhyānānāṃ rūpadhātau tu tābhyāṃ dharmatayāpi ca //
SA01vakobhku:vakk_8.41_0: nimīlite śāstari lokacakṣuṣi kṣayaṃ gate sākṣijane ca bhūyasā /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_8.42_0: gate 'tha śāntiṃ paramāṃ svayaṃbhuvi svayaṃbhuvaḥ śāsanadhūrdhareṣu ca /
SA01vakobhku:vakk_8.43_1: balakālaṃ malānāṃ ca na pramādyaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ //
